# Installation

## Requirements
1. Windows/Linux OS
2. Python 3.9
3. Installed modules (see [requirements.txt](https://github.com/artem94m/kingfisher/blob/main/requirements.txt)):
    - [xmlschema](https://pypi.org/project/xmlschema/)
    - [defusedxml](https://pypi.org/project/defusedxml/)
    - [reportlab](https://pypi.org/project/reportlab/)

## Installation steps
1. Install Python 3.9
2. Download [kingfisher-main.zip](https://github.com/artem94m/kingfisher/archive/refs/heads/main.zip)
3. Extract it wherever you want
4. Change directory to extracted **kingfisher-main**
5. Install all the required modules: `python3.9 -m pip install -r requirements.txt`
6. Use scanner as it is described [here](usage)
